subproject.corporate outcome: Building capacity of institutions and communities in disaster risk management and sustainable use of natural resources
subproject.description: The project will provide enabling environment and a platform in line with Hyogo Framework of Action (HFA) for different disaster management organizations to coordinate better and work as a team. Projects undertaken included designing of safe hospitals and school buidlings in the Eastern Sri Lanka and development of educational and traning materials plus a caravan for dissiminating information. It supports the National Disaster Management Coordinating Commmittee - the national platform under HFA. This project is also included the support to flood emergencies in May 2010 and January 20111. Project also supported the provision of safe drainage and environment management of the Menik Farm IDP complex that housed  more than 300 000 IDP's during 2009/10 period. Funding for this project is by UNISDR, UNHCR, OXFAM GB and BCPR TRAC 3.
subproject.title: Promoting Disaster Risk Reduct
